name: Decisions Archive
short_description:
A web application to allow easy and flexible financial control and authorization of business decisions submitted by staff members. 
The application allows a flexible way to document the decisions process, in situations that require the agreement of two or more parties in an organisation (ex. an employee and the financial controller, or a large procurement that requires legal reviews and sign-offs). 
The application syncs with a target financial system to retrieve the latest balance and budget updates, a reporting system, and also uploads finalised decisions to the same financial system.
